biomepedia.biome.byg.allium_fields.desc: Lush flowering fields with Pink & Purple Allium Bushes. Large oak trees and villages can be commonly found here.
biomepedia.biome.byg.amaranth_fields.des: Lush flowering fields with Red, Magenta, Cyan, Orange, & Purple Amaranth Flower Bushes can be found here. Tropical jacaranda trees & jacaranda bushes.
biomepedia.biome.byg.araucaria_savanna.d: A dry yet floral savanna with canopy araucaria trees & acacia trees. Savanna villages can be commonly found here.
biomepedia.biome.byg.aspen_forest.desc: The Aspen Forest is home to lots of lush flora such as Pink Alliums, Rose, Yellow Daffodils, and Orange Daisies. Dense amounts of aspen trees can be found here along with Taiga Villages.
biomepedia.biome.byg.atacama_desert.desc: A vibrant and floral desert with an abundance of Barrel Cacti, Cacti, Golden Spined Cacti, Prickly Pear Cacti, Aloe Vera, Anemones, & Sages. In the real world, the Atacama Desert is located in Chile, South America along the Pacific Coast!
biomepedia.biome.byg.prairie.desc: A vibrant and hilly grassland with Prairie Grass & Tall Prairie Grass. California Poppies, large oak trees, and villages can be commonly found here.
biomepedia.biomeabout.dimensions.none: This biome doesn't spawn in any dimension.
biomepedia.biomeabout.mobspawns.none: This biome doesn't spawn any mobs.
biomepedia.desc.block.byg.pendorite_bloc:
This is a Pendorite Block, and if you managed to get this, you're genuinely flexing at this point.
Like how did you do it and how are you so cool like whoaaaaa.

Anyways if you made it this far, you're cool for reading this :)
biomepedia.intro:
Hi and welcome to the Oh The Biomes You'll Go(or "BYG" for short) biomepedia! Here you'll find information in regards to our biomes, blocks, items, tools, and more! On the right hand page, select the item you're looking for.

Thank you for playing BYG! <3
Learn more about BYG's blocks & items!
biomepedia.intro.options.download.hover: Get the latest BYG from the official download page!
biomepedia.intro.options.issues.hover: Found a bug or issue? Report it to us!
biomepedia.intro.options.translate.hover: Know any other languages beyond English? Help us translate!
byg.advancements.biomepediagift.title: Biome knowledge is Power!

byg.advancements.husbandry.hot_diggity_n: Cook a Cattail on a campfire, you might wanna back away...
byg.advancements.husbandry.just_like_gra: Craft any of the 4 BYG pies.

byg.command.config.error: "%s" is not a valid config type!
byg.command.updateconfig.configsuptodate: Configs are already up to date!
byg.command.updateconfig.contactserverow: Contact the server owner and let them know BYG's configs are outdated!
byg.command.updateconfig.notifyplayersse: BYG: The server owner has decided to shutdown the server to update BYG configs, server shuts down in 60 seconds....
byg.command.updateconfig.notifyserverown: BYG: Server configs are outdated, notify the server owner to run the command "%s" or "%s" from the dedicated server console.
BYG: Server configs are outdated, notify the host to run the command "%s" or "%s".
byg.command.updateconfig.outdatedconfigs: BYG: Configs need updating click either of the highlighted options to update %s or %s
byg.command.updateconfig.update.hover: Running this command will update your configs and restart your game! A backup of your BYG configs will be created in %s
byg.command.updateconfig.warngameclose: BYG: Warning this command will close your game to ensure all configs are re-read. A backup of your BYG configs will be created in ".../config/byg/backups"
byg.command.updateconfig.warnplayers: BYG: Warning the server owner is attempting to update all BYG configs, all connected users should expect the possibility of being disconnected...
byg.end.not.used:
Warning: You are receiving this warning because BYG's End Biome Source is not being used in this world's End and therefore renders BYG's end config useless. Your config specifies it should be using it! If this is intentional(ie using another end mod), you may disable this warning from appearing in future worlds by visiting your config found here: "%s" and setting "warnBYGEndBiomeSourceNotUsedInNewWorlds" to "false"!
If this is not intentional please follow the instructions found here: %s to enable BYG's end.
byg.experimental.warning: You are currently using an experimental or an incomplete version of BYG. Worlds are bound to break or bug if you update BYG in this world!
byg.nether.not.used:
Warning: You are receiving this warning because BYG's Nether Biome Source is not being used in this world's Nether and therefore renders BYG's nether config useless. Your config specifies it should be using it! If this is intentional(ie using another nether mod), you may disable this warning from appearing in future worlds by visiting your config found here: "%s" and setting "warnBYGNetherBiomeSourceNotUsedInNewWorlds" to "false"!
If this is not intentional please follow the instructions found here: %s to enable BYG's nether.
byg.nether.not.used.terrablender:
Warning: You are receiving this warning because BYG's Nether Biome Source is not being used in this world's Nether and therefore renders BYG's nether config useless. Your config specifies it should be using it! If this is intentional(ie using another nether mod), you may disable this warning from appearing in future worlds by visiting BYG's nether config found here: "%s" and setting "warnBYGNetherBiomeSourceNotUsedInNewWorlds" to "false"!
We've detected that this world's biome source is controlled by terrablender, please set "replace_default_nether" to "false" in the terrablender config found here: %s.
 Bare in mind this change applies in new worlds only, if this is an existing world follow thee instructions found here: %s
byg.screen.configloadfail.recreateconfig: Backup & recreate your configs, then restart minecraft.
byg.screen.configloadfail.title: BYG Config loading failed:
byg.screen.configloadfail.validate.hover: Load configs again, if they work, you will continue to load into your world.
byg.worldgenexport.exists: World generation export already exists! View it here: %s!
byg.worldgenexport.failed: Uh oh, the world generation export could not be created, check your latest.log!
byg.worldgenexport.singleplayer: World generation export command must be used in single player!
byg.worldgenexport.starting: Starting world generation export, expect server lag & high ram usage...
byg.worldgenexport.success: World generation export successful! View the files here: %s!
